headline: Truist Lowers Robinhood (HOOD) PT to $130 Citing Falling Crypto Prices, Market Overreaction
summary: Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) is one of the most profitable new stocks to buy right now. On February 6, Truist lowered its price target for Robinhood from $155 to $130 and maintained a Buy rating. The adjustment was made as the stock experienced significant pressure alongside falling cryptocurrency prices; however, the firm believes the market […]

headline: Robinhood Sees Dogecoin Inflows As Ark Invest Builds Long Term Position
summary: Large Dogecoin transfers have recently moved onto Robinhood, with several high value transactions flowing into the platform during a period of sharp crypto price swings. Crypto trading activity on Robinhood appears elevated as volatility picks up, reinforcing the platform’s role as a key venue for retail crypto trading. Ark Invest has continued to accumulate shares of Robinhood Markets (NasdaqGS:HOOD), adding to its position despite the broader market downturn. Robinhood Markets, known for...

headline: Dow 50,000 sets table for inflation data, delayed January jobs report: What to watch this week
summary: As investors turn toward the coming week, Wall Street will look to build on Friday's sharp turnaround into the green as investors process the drastic software and crypto sell-off.
